thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 6 of 1699
thread.title: Susan

author: Susan
title: Susan
text:
I am new to FlightHub this past 6 months and have been thrilled with their service! I used to be Expedia exclusive because they included all taxes and fees in the price presented on line at a glance. However finding FlightHub does the same thing AND appears to be able to get me an even better price they are now my official go to flight booking site! I also love their Fare Alert service!
Thank you FlightHub for making my bookings so easy!
